name: server
description: Backend logic for Noor web-scraper.Using 'puppeteer' it allows the user to scrape the captcha code that is in a form of a picture. then proceed to scrape the name of the logged in user. this is a part of the full system. the full system also scrapes all the parents/guradians names and contact numbers of logged-in school, but is commercially in-use as of now.
author: Meshu
